summary:
Sets the base cooldown for most shouts to 5. First Word: 5s Second Word: 10s Third Word: 15s
Some more powerful shouts are reduced but not as much.
descriptionHtml:
Sets the base cooldown for most shouts to 5. First Word: 5s Second Word: 10s Third Word: 15s
Some more powerful shouts are reduced but not as much.

Shouts below may be considered a SPOILER if you haven\'t progressed far enough to learn them

Storm Call: Base 1m Cooldown (add a minute for each word)
Call Dragon: Base 1m Cooldown

All the other shouts should be a base 5sec cooldown.

Endorse and check out my other mods :)
author: Windrider494
